attributes.comment:
We are adoptive parents. The fees are already incredibly high and very difficult for
middle class parents to afford. I am also concerned to as why the fingerprints
expire before the actual immigration approval? We were forced to take yet
another day off work and drive 2 hours ONE WAY to submit YET AGAIN our
fingerprints and pay another $140 for this process. We feel our own government is
robbing us and we do not see why it is set up this way. Even if you feel it is
necessary to re-submit the fingerprints. Why is it not possible to use the same
prints we gave at the beginning to at least spare us from missing work and the
gas expense to drive all that way?!!! There is room for much improvement with the
international adoption process in the United States. The time it takes to receive
your child's immigration approval is awful !!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Michelle R. Reed
